column1: Welcome to 6 grade. Below you will find a list of supplies needed by each student in grade 6.
Please label all supplies with your name and homeroom! Thank you o
Team 6R1- Mrs. Milot- HR 203 & Mrs. Tollerton- HR 204
Team 6R2- Mrs. Gold- HR 205 & Mrs. McNeil- HR 206
Team 6R3- Mrs. Ireland- HR 207 & Mrs. Rickert- HR 208
All 6th grade teachers request the following basic supplies. If you have trouble finding something, substitute
with a similar item (NO TRAPPER KEEPERS OR ACCORDION FOLDERS).
General u Zippered pencil pouch, preferably one that attaches inside a 3 ring binder
Supplies u #2 pencils with erasers (2 doz. to start)
o Hand held pencil sharpener (We do not have them.)
o Loose-leaf paper (4 pkgs. to start, replenish as needed)
o Pkg. of 4 x 6 white, lined index cards
Homeroom u 2" White 3 -ring binder with pocket folder inside.
Reading o Purple heavy Duty plastic folder
• 1" Purple 3 -ring binder & composition notebook- w/ Infantino or. Rathke
If you have any questions or concern►, please call the School office at 758-7676. Sec you in September!! 0
